time_simulate.description: Generates data file for simulation of reaction over time
time_simulate.\tfixed: Runs the reaction a fixed number of times, specified by max_cycles
time_simulate.\tequillibrium: Runs reaction until it reaches equillibrium, or max_cycles is reached
time_simulate.<json>: directory of config file containing reaction parameters

plot.description: Plots data in a specified data file using parameters from json file
plot.<json>: directory of config file containing parameters for the plot

protein_fold_data.description: Generates data file containing equillibrium concentrations of species at varying urea concentration
protein_fold_data.<json>: directory of config file containing parameters for this urea range

help.description: Displays a list of available commands. If <command> is specified, returns syntax information for specific command
help.<command>: Command to return syntax information for
